metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0803 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Inappropriate implementation in Permissions in Google Chrome prior to99.0.4844.51 allowed a remote attacker to tamper with the contents of theOmnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
